verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees אֵ֭לֶיךָ <S%H413><s%> 'E-lei-cha unto נָשָׂ֣אתִי <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa-ti Unto thee lift I up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵינַ֑י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai; mine eyes הַ֝יֹּשְׁבִ֗י <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-she-Vi, O thou that dwellest בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> bash-sha-Ma-yim. in the heavens

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold כְעֵינֵ֪י <S%H5869><s%> che-'ei-Nei Behold as the eyes עֲבָדִ֡ים <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim of servants אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יַ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> yad [look] unto the hand אֲ‍ ֽדוֹנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H113><s%> ado-nei-Hem, of their masters כְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> ke-'ei-Nei [and] as the eyes שִׁפְחָה֮ <S%H8198><s%> shif-Chah of a maiden אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יַ֪ד <S%H3027><s%> yad unto the hand גְּבִ֫רְתָּ֥הּ <S%H1404><s%> ge-Vir-Tah of her mistress כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken So עֵ֭ינֵינוּ <S%H5869><s%> 'Ei-nei-nu so our eyes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [wait] upon the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; our God עַ֝֗ד <S%H5704><s%> 'Ad, Until שֶׁיְּחָנֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H2603><s%> shei-ye-chan-Ne-nu. until that he have mercy

חָנֵּ֣נוּ <S%H2603><s%> chan-Ne-nu Have mercy יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh upon us O LORD חָנֵּ֑נוּ <S%H2603><s%> chan-Ne-nu; have mercy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for רַ֝֗ב <S%H7227><s%> Rav, upon us for we are exceedingly שָׂבַ֥עְנוּ <S%H7646><s%> sa-Va'-nu filled בֽוּז׃ <S%H937><s%> Vuz. with contempt

רַבַּת֮ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bat is exceedingly שָֽׂבְעָה־ <S%H7646><s%> sa-ve-'ah- filled לָּ֪הּ lah נַ֫פְשֵׁ֥נוּ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-nu Our soul הַלַּ֥עַג <S%H3933><s%> hal-La-'ag with the scorning הַשַּׁאֲנַנִּ֑ים <S%H7600><s%> hash-sha-'a-nan-Nim; of those that are at ease הַ֝בּ֗וּז <S%H937><s%> hab-Buz, [and] with the contempt לִגְאֵ֥יוֹנִֽים׃ <S%H1349><s%> lig-'E-yo-nim of the proud
